feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 7:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
